LanguageData.WitnessedDeathAllyBleedingHeart.stages.0: I saw one of my people die. I can't believe they're gone. I'll never speak to them again.
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathNonAllyBleedingHeart.stage: I saw someone die. I saw the light in their eyes, snuffed out as they fell.
A guilty prisoner or guest was executed. It was justified, but I still can't abide the loss of life.
A prisoner or guest was euthanized. It was humane, but still heartbreaking.
A prisoner or guest was killed in cold blood. I can't believe this!
A prisoner or guest died because the colony took body parts from him. I'm livid!
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecutedBleedingHeart.stages: A guilty colonist was executed. It was justified, but I still can't abide the loss of life.
A colonist was euthanized. It was humane, but still heartbreaking.
A colonist was killed in cold blood. I can't believe this!
A colonist died because someone took body parts from him. I'm livid!
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerDiedInnocentBleedingHeart.st: One of our prisoners died despite being harmless. We have a duty to take care of our prisoners. If we wanted them dead, we could have at least conducted an orderly execution rather than permit that barbarism.
LanguageData.KnowColonistDiedBleedingHeart.stages.0.d: One of our people died. If only we'd done something differently...
